formElement.label: VM Name
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to power on.

formElement.label: Create Resources
formElement.documentation: Flag to specify whether or not to create an ElectricCommander resource for the powered on virtual machine.

formElement.label: Workspace
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander workspace the created resource should use.

formElement.label: Pool
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the created resource.

formElement.label: Timeout
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
